::Shadow Stalker::

"Firearm lookout!" Shadow stalker said in pain.  He was shot in the back and 
took damage feeling weaker every minute.

"Argh, Thunder Hammer, time to feel true pain."  Shadow Stalker started to 
use his lazer vision for the first time.  Shadow Stalker was aiming at 
Thunder Hammer's chest.  BAM!  Take that!
